response.overview: Boosie is showing off his “Badazz” side as an entrepreneur beyond his Rap Snacks partnerships, Black Bayou Vapes and cinematic debut of his life struggle, “My Struggle”, to now turning his social frenzy battle to a full out protest against censorship on platforms that limit freedom of expression.  “Boosie Gone Bad” premiered Wednesday, March 16th, 2022 on Pay Per View with a FREE pre-show limited on a first come first serve basis 4pm-6pm ET that consists of the Boosie Baddie preliminary games with the official Boosie Baddie Games kicking off at 6pm ET, followed by a live performance from Boosie himself at 8pm ET.
response.title: Boosie Gone Bad
